p: We obtained and assembled the full genome of the index case isolate, BJDX-01-2015. The sequence of this genome has been deposited in GenBank (accession number MK886831). The complete genome of BJDX-01-2015 was 34,774 nucleotides in length and had 137-bp inverted terminal repeat sequences in the 5′- and 3′- untranslated regions (5′-UTR and 3′-UTR).
